title: Muhyo & Roji's Bureau of Supernatural Investigation, Vol. 1
description: Exorcism Specialists in Supernatural Law EnforcementAre you a victim of unwanted spirit possession? Is there a ghost you need sent up and away...or down to burn for all eternity? If the answer is yes, then you need Muhyo and Roji, experts in magic law. Serving justice to evil spirits is their specialty.When the ghost of a tormented schoolgirl starts terrorizing subway passengers, can Muhyo and Roji resolve the paranormal crisis before it totally derails?
author: Yoshiyuki Nishi
